options.name: Selective Data
options.description: Cherry-picking the scope of data, e.g., picking an arbitrary starting point of the time axis.

options.name: Missing Values
options.description: Null values in the chart that causes confusion.

options.name: Redundant Values
options.description: Items appear more than once in the chart.

options.name: Questionable Data
options.description: Dubious data source.

options.name: Hypothetical Data
options.description: Not real data, but drawn like backed by data.

options.name: Binning
options.description: Items are grouped arbitrarily.

options.name: Item Order
options.description: Items are not sorted, or out of order.

options.name: Percentage Not 100%
options.description: Percentages do not add up to 100% in a whole-part relationship.

options.name: Faulty Statistics
options.description: Improper use of statistics, e.g., a regression line with high error.

options.name: Unreliable Prediction
options.description: Plotting future data points derived from unreliable prediction.

options.name: Base Line Alignment
options.description: Values are indexed or normalized by an unconventional method.

options.name: Color Convention
options.description: Mismatch between colors and the objects that they represent, e.g., blue for apples.

options.name: Color Scheme
options.description: Ineffective color scheme, e.g., categorical colors for continuous variable.

options.name: Disguised Visualization
options.description: Looks like a visualization, but not visualizing any data, also known as non-sequitur.

options.name: False Description
options.description: Description and visualization do not add up.

options.name: Annotation
options.description: Improper annotation or highlight.

options.name: Invalid Connection
options.description: Lines or arrows are connecting unrelated dots.

options.name: Map Projection
options.description: Distort map projection to encode information

options.name: Absurd Scale
options.description: Data is drawn to an unconventional scale.

options.name: Poor Encoding Choice
options.description: Chart is understandable, but unintuitive, there are better alternatives.

options.name: Invalid Encoding Choice
options.description: Only understandable by extracting the data from the chart, but not its visual form.

options.name: Plotting Error
options.description: Valid encoding choice but incorrectly drawn, e.g., a glitch.

options.name: Positioning
options.description: Poor positioning, alignment, or rotation of items.

options.name: Too Many Colors
options.description: Too many colors, mostly related to the scalability issues.

options.name: Misrepresentation
options.description: The geometric shapes do not match the labelled values.

options.name: Inconsistent Scale Across
options.description: Different scales across related charts.

options.name: Log Scale
options.description: Incorrect use of log scale.

options.name: Missing Item Labels
options.description: Missing label for item details.

options.name: Incorrect Item Labels
options.description: Items are labeled with incorrect description.

options.name: Missing Axis
options.description: Axis is missing for a coordinated chart.

options.name: Missing Axis Labels
options.description: Axis is not labeled with tick marks.

options.name: Incorrect Axis Labels
options.description: Axis is incorrectly labeled.

options.name: Flipped Axis
options.description: Axis values are increasing in an unconventional direction.

options.name: Truncated Axis
options.description: Non-zero starting point on an axis that exaggerates or understates differences between items.

options.name: Dual Axes
options.description: Plotting more than one different scale on a single dimension, most often the y-axis.

options.name: Inconsistent Tick Interval
options.description: Intervals on an axis does not follow a scale.

options.name: Inconsistent Time Interval
options.description: Inconsistent time interval between data points.

options.name: Missing Legend
options.description: Legend is needed but missing.

options.name: Undistinguishable Colors
options.description: Categorical colors are undistinguishable with each other.

options.name: Animation
options.description: Eye beats memory, comparing changes across animation frames is impossible.

options.name: Confusing Legend
options.description: Lengend is not helpful in understanding the chart.

options.name: Confusing Label
options.description: Labels are hard to understand or not understandable at all.

options.name: Cluttering
options.description: Overwhelmed by visual clutter.

options.name: Occlusion
options.description: Some items are not visible in the visualization because of blockage by another item.

options.name: Chart Junk
options.description: Chart ornament that causes negative effect in understanding.

options.name: Illegible Text
options.description: Text in the chart are illegible.

options.name: Visually Awful
options.description: Very disturbing while looking at it.

options.name: False Color Correlation
options.description: Items with same or similar colors are not related.

options.name: 3D
options.description: Unjustified use of 3D, it distorts the perceived size of the items.

options.name: Area Encoding
options.description: Incorrect use of area encoding that exaggerates or understates differences between items.

options.name: Area Encoded Pictogram
options.description: Pictogram is improperly scaled to reflect value differences.

options.name: Not Understandable
options.description: Cannot decode any data nor information.

options.name: Faulty Whole Part
options.description: Not whole-part relationship but draw as a chart for whole-part relationship like pie chart.

options.name: Faulty Logic
options.description: Conveying an illogical message.

options.name: Missing Context
options.description: Need background information in order to understand the message.

options.name: Invalid Comparison
options.description: Comparison between items that are incomparable.

options.name: Population Map
options.description: The observed pattern is nothing more than the pattern of population density.

options.name: Spurious Correlation
options.description: Suggesting causal relationships from correlations.

subcategories.name: Data Related
subcategories.description: Issues related to the underlying data

subcategories.name: Coordinated
subcategories.description: Spatial meaning in x-, y-, or z-axes
